tag.professioncustom.cold.desc: Has a chance to freeze targets on attack, continuously causes cold effects around
tag.professioncustom.resurrect.desc: Has a chance to resurrect on death, restores health and gains regeneration and resistance effects
tag.professioncustom.brutal.desc: Increases damage on attack, higher level means more damage bonus
tag.professioncustom.explosive.desc: Explodes on death, higher level means more explosion power
tag.professioncustom.greedy.desc: Deals double damage on attack, but loses own health
tag.professioncustom.vampire.desc: Drains target's health to restore own health on attack
tag.professioncustom.lightburst.desc: Causes blindness and darkness effects on target
tag.professioncustom.frenzy.desc: Each attack creates attack particles that damage entities in range
tag.professioncustom.swift.desc: Permanently increases movement speed, higher level means more speed
tag.professioncustom.unmatched.desc: Doubles own stats, higher level means more multiplier (health, attack, armor)
tag.professioncustom.soul.desc: Immune to normal attacks, can only be damaged by explosion, magic, projectiles, or fire
tag.professioncustom.teleport.desc: Teleports to target when health decreases by 10%
tag.professioncustom.celestial.desc: When attacked, controls the attacker, generates particles above target and strikes down, higher level means higher trigger chance
tag.professioncustom.leader.desc: Summons same type entities with lower level when attacked, tag level equals summon count
tag.professioncustom.desperate.desc: Triggers when health is below 5%, gains Soul, Unmatched, Explosive, Swift, Celestial, and Vampire tags, Desperate tag is removed after trigger
